text: A Fairlie locomotive is a type of railway steam locomotive. Fairlie may also refer to: == People == * Fairlie (surname) * Fairlie Harmar, (1876–1945), English painter == Places == * Fairlies Knob National Park, in Queensland, Australia * Fairlie, New Zealand, a town in the South Island of New Zealand * Fairlie, North Ayrshire, a village in North Ayrshire, Scotland == Other uses == * the Fairlie Mortar, a design of anti-submarine mortar
title: Fairlie (disambiguation)
